price: 56 Allah disposera, ce Jour-là, de l’autorité suprême en vertu de laquelle Il jugera les hommes. Ceux qui auront cru et accompli de bonnes œuvres seront admis dans les jardins des délices,
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin lillahi yaḥkumu baynahum fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
